description:
Speak the name and version of the application you are currently focused on, by pressing NVDA+Shift+v.
Pressing twice will copy this information to the clipboard, to paste in bug reports, etc.
Pressing three times copies only the version.
The key can be remapped.
Read help to find tips for hearing NVDA and Windows versions.

translations.description:
Speak the name and version of the application you are currently focused on, by pressing NVDA+Shift+v.
Pressing twice will copy this information to the clipboard, to paste in bug reports, etc.
Pressing three times copies only the version.
The key can be remapped.
Read help to find tips for hearing NVDA and Windows versions.

translations.displayName: Докладване на името и версията на продукта (Say Product Name and Version)
translations.description:
Докладване на името и версията на приложението, което е фокусирано в момента, чрез натискане на NVDA+Shift+V.
Двукратното натискане ще копира тази информация в клипборда, с цел поставяне в доклади за грешки и т.н.
Трикратното натискане копира само номера на версията.
Клавишната комбинация може да бъде променена.
Прочетете документацията, за да намерите съвети за проверка на версиите на NVDA и Windows.

Speak the name and version of the application you are currently focused on, by pressing NVDA+Shift+v.
Pressing twice will copy this information to the clipboard, to paste in bug reports, etc.
Pressing three times copies only the version.
The key can be remapped.
Read help to find tips for hearing NVDA and Windows versions.

translations.displayName: Name und Version der Anwendung mitteilen
translations.description:
Teilt den Namen und die Version der fokussierten Anwendung mit, indem Sie NVDA+Umschalt+V drücken.
Bei zweimaligem drücken werden diese Informationen in die Zwischenablage kopiert, um sie in Fehlerberichte, etc. einzufügen.
Bei dreimaligem Drücken wird nur die Versionsnummer in die Zwischenablage kopiert.
Die Tastenkombination kann bei Bedarf geändert werden.
In der Hilfe finden Sie Tipps zum Hören von NVDA- und Windows-Versionen.

translations.displayName: Decir nombre de producto y versión
translations.description:
Verbaliza el nombre y versión de la aplicación en la que te encuentras pulsando NVDA+shift+v.
Si se pulsa dos veces, copia esta información al portapapeles, para pegarla en informes de fallos, etc.
Pulsando tres veces se copia sólo la versión.
Se puede reasignar el atajo.
Lee la ayuda para descubrir consejos sobre cómo oír las versiones de Windows y NVDA.

نام و نسخه‌ی برنامه‌ای که در فکوس قرار دارد را با فشارِ کلیدهای NVDA+Shift+V می‌خوانَد.
با دو بار فشردن، این اطلاعات در کلیپ‌برد کپی می‌شود، تا آن را در گزارش‌های آسیب یا غیره بچسبانید.
با سه بار فشردن، تنها شماره‌ی نسخه‌ی برنامه کپی می‌شود.
کلید یادشده را می‌توان تغییر داد.
برای یافتن راهنمایی برای شنیدن نسخه‌ی NVDA و ویندوز با این افزونه، راهنمای افزونه را مطالعه کنید.

Puhu aktiivisen sovelluksen nimi ja versio painamalla NVDA+Vaihto+V.
Kahdesti painettaessa tiedot kopioidaan leikepöydälle, jotta voit liittää tiedot virheraportteihin jne.
Kolmesti painettaessa kopioidaan vain versionumero.
Näppäinkomennon uudelleenmäärittäminen on mahdollista.
Lue ohjeet saadaksesi vinkkejä NVDA- ja Windowsin versioiden kuulemiseen.

translations.displayName: Annoncer le Nom de l'Application et sa Version
translations.description:
Annoncer le nom et la version de l'application sous la fenêtre actuellement focalisée en appuyant sur NVDA+Maj+v.\n
Appuyer deux fois copiera ces informations dans le presse-papiers, pour les coller dans les rapports de bogues, etc.\n
Appuyer trois fois pour copier uniquement la version.\n
La touche peut être remappée.\n
Lire l'aide pour trouver des conseils pour entendre les versions de NVDA et Windows.

translations.displayName: Dicir nome de produto e Versión
translations.description:
Speak the name and version of the application you are currently focused on, by pressing NVDA+Shift+v.
Pressing twice will copy this information to the clipboard, to paste in bug reports, etc.
Pressing three times copies only the version.
The key can be remapped.
Read help to find tips for hearing NVDA and Windows versions.

translations.displayName: Informa o nome e a versão do produto
translations.description:
Diga o nome e a versão da aplicação em que está atualmente concentrado, premindo NVDA+Shift+v.
Premir duas vezes copia esta informação para a área de transferência, para colar em relatórios de erros, etc.
Se premir três vezes, copia apenas a versão.
A tecla pode ser remapeada.
Leia a ajuda para encontrar dicas para ouvir as versões do NVDA e do Windows.

Speak the name and version of the application you are currently focused on, by pressing NVDA+Shift+v.
Pressing twice will copy this information to the clipboard, to paste in bug reports, etc.
Pressing three times copies only the version.
The key can be remapped.
Read help to find tips for hearing NVDA and Windows versions.

Произносит название и версию приложения, на котором вы в данный момент работаете, по нажатию NVDA+Shift+v.
При двойном нажатии эта информация будет скопирована в буфер обмена для вставки в сообщения об ошибках и т.д.
При тройном нажатии будет скопирована только версия приложения.
Клавишу можно переназначить.
Ознакомьтесь со справкой, чтобы найти советы по прослушиванию версий NVDA и Windows.

NVDA+Shift+v tuşlarına basmak o anda odaklanmış olan uygulamanın adını ve sürümünü duyurur.
İki kez basmak, hata raporlarını vb. yapıştırmak için bu bilgiyi panoya kopyalayacaktır.
Üç kez basıldığında yalnızca sürüm kopyalanır.
Hareket yeniden eşlenebilir.
NVDA ve Windows sürümlerini duymaya yönelik ipuçları bulmak için yardım okunabilir.
